meanings.sent1: The dunnest night sky was filled with twinkling stars.
meanings.sent2: Her hair was the dunnest shade of black I had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The dunnest paint color made the room feel cozy and warm.
meanings.sent4: The dunnest clouds hung low, threatening rain.
meanings.sent5: The dunnest shadow cast by the tree made it look like a giant monster.

meanings.sent1: She dunnest the room by closing all the curtains.
meanings.sent2: The storm clouds dunnested the once sunny sky.
meanings.sent3: His bad mood dunnested the cheerful atmosphere of the party.
meanings.sent4: The sad news dunnested her usual bright smile.
meanings.sent5: The old, abandoned house was dunnested by years of neglect.
